__e: And ask my granddaughter to come and visit me one day, will you?
Your 16-year-old granddaughter wants to go to a college party where there's drinking and God knows what else.
He has a wife and two children and a granddaughter from his first marriage.
The house is worth far more than that... but I have a very young granddaughter... and £1,200 in the bank for her would ease my mind considerably.
I know that you know, that my granddaughter is in this house, visiting.
And now your grandbaby's back here and staying here because of me, so you should thank me.
